field.name: name
field.doc: Given name, alias, colloquial, or short name for the rheometer. For manufacturer names and identifiers use respective manufacturer fields.

field.name: model
field.doc: Hardware name, hash identifier, or serial number that was given by the manufacturer to identify the device.

field.name: description
field.doc: Ideally an identifier, persistent link, or free text which gives further details about the device.

field.name: frequency
field.doc: Induced oscillation frequency of the measurement geometry

field.name: osciallation_strain
field.doc: For osciallation measurements. Strain setting for the induced oscillation of the measurement geometry

field.name: osciallation_stress
field.doc: For osciallation measurements. Stress setting for the induced osciallation of the measurement geometry

field.name: phase_angle
field.doc: Phase shift angle for an induced osciallation measurment

field.name: viscosity
field.doc: Measured or calcualted viscosity parameter of the sample in units of pressure * time.

field.name: depends_on
field.doc: Specifies the position of the lens by pointing to the last transformation in the transformation chain in the NXtransformations group.

group.doc: Collection of axis-based translations and rotations to describe the location and geometry of the lens as a component in the instrument. Typically, the components of a system should all be related relative to each other and only one component should relate to the reference coordinate system.
